Description: Bronze figure of kneeling king; incised Hieroglyphic text on belt.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Prof Francis Llewellyn Griffith
Dimensions: Height: 9.20 centimetres (Displayed height when tangs inset into base)
Curator's comments: Published: W.V.Davies (ed.) Egypt and Africa (1991) [PL.14,2]. PM VII, p.189.
Exhibition history: 2018-2019 8 Nov-24 Feb, London, BM, I am Ashurbanipal, king of the world, king of Assyria 2022 27 April – 25 July, Paris, Musée du Louvre, Pharaoh of the Two Lands
